{{Infobox Berry |name = #61 Ganlon |image = [[File:Ganlon.png]] |caption = This Berry is surrounded by mystery. It is rumored to be imbued with the power of the land. |growtime = 2d |harvest = 0.5 berries |replant = 0% |points = 10,000 |flavor =
*0 spicy *30 dry *10 sweet *30 bitter *0 sour }} '''Ganlon''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by having at least one empty plot and at least 23 ripe [[Shuca]] on the field. #383 Groudon must have been caught to unlock this berry. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center; |+ Growth Stages ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 6 hours || 12 hours || 1 day || 2 days - 4 days |- ! Animation | [[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] || [[File:GanlonTreeTaller.png|50px]] || [[File:GanlonTreeBloom.png|50px]] || [[File:GanlonTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your [[Farm]] in the following way to obtain this berry. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- | style="width: 50px;" | || style="width: 50px;" | [[File:Shuca.png|30px]]
